dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4492 IH: TRICARE Moms Improvement Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Capps introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the availability of breastfeeding support, supplies, and counseling under the TRICARE program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the TRICARE Moms Improvement Act of 2014.

section.header: Availability of breastfeeding support, supplies, and counseling under the tricare program
section.text: Section 1079(a) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: Breastfeeding support, supplies (including breast pumps and associated equipment), and counseling shall be provided as appropriate during pregnancy and the postpartum period.
